document_data.name: Jaskir Dawn
document_data.text: Thavius Kreeg ordered me to deliver Lady Shandeir back to Elturel immediately.
document_data.mainbody: At some point prior to the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, Jaskir was tasked with safely delivering the sage [[Shandeir]] to Elturel. They were accompanied on this journey by [[Falaster Fisk]] and [[Sylvira Savikas]]. They chartered passage with the [[White Sails Company]] aboard the ''[[Hesperornis]]''. When the ship detoured to [[Mintarn]], Jaskir protested but was overruled by Shandeir.{{Cite comic/A Darkened Wish 2|12-14}}{{Cite comic/A Darkened Wish 3|6-7}}
document_data.Personality: Jaskir was dedicated to [[Thavius Kreeg]], the High Overseer of Elturel, whom he attributed with summoning the Companion to free Elturel from its [[vampire]] rulers. His aspirations were to serve loyally and to raise his children in peace.
